thread.title: Brendon White, a Columbus prospect recently offered by Ohio State, commits to Buckeyes: Ohio State football recruiting
thread.title_full: Brendon White, a Columbus prospect recently offered by Ohio State, commits to Buckeyes: Ohio State football recruiting | cleveland.com

author: Ari Wasserman, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: Brendon White, a Columbus prospect recently offered by Ohio State, commits to Buckeyes: Ohio State football recruiting
text:
COLUMBUS, Ohio -- What happens when Ohio State offers a Columbus-area prospect?
That prospect commits. It usually happens fast, too.
That's what happened in the case of three-star safety Brendon White of Powell (Ohio) Liberty. He earned his Ohio State offer on Wednesday, then announced his verbal pledge to the Buckeyes on Friday afternoon.
Blessed to say I have committed to play football at The Ohio State University!!üôèüèΩüå∞üî¥ #Gobucks
‚Äî brendon white5‚É£ (@therealestbw0) October 2, 2015
Rated the No. 22 safety in the 2017 recruiting class in the 247Sports composite rankings , White chose the Buckeyes over other early scholarship offers from Michigan State, Notre Dame, Boston College, Illinois, Kentucky and others.
White visited Ohio State last weekend for the Buckeyes win over Western Michigan. He added the Buckeyes offer a few days later.
The son of former Ohio State defensive back William White, The 6-foot-2, 195-pound prospect became the commitment No. 11 in the Buckeyes' 2017 recruiting class. Ohio State is almost full in 2016, and now next year's class is almost halfway there.
